testcase.classname: To verify and validate the funtionalities of adactin hotel.
testcase.name: To check the search hotel page functionalities.
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in the adactin hotel home page.....................passed When To fill the "Jothikrishna" and "Life@heaven" with valid credentials....passed And Click the login button..................................................passed And The user have to select options for location, hotel, room type, No. of room..passed And The user have to fill the datein and dateout option.....................passed And The user have to select options for adult per person and children per person option and give search..passed Then Check whether it directs us to the select hotel page...................passed
